post_title: 1909 T206 Clarke (Batting) and Huggins (Hands to Mouth)
post_content:
1909 T206 Clarke (Holding bat)-crescent crease on right side which is evident in the front scan. The crease is also evident on the back left side. Also, two little white dots between the second and third red lines on the lower arm on the right side. Finally, this card also has corner wear. 

1909 T206 Huggins (Hands to mouth). It has the following flaws:

Corner wear

Diagonal wrinkle top center border into hat

A half semicircular wrinkle going down from the first "I" in Cincinatti and coming up into the second

Bottom left corner crease

Back wear under the "E" and "C" in "SUBJECTS" which goes through the diagonal line.

Diagonal loss of paper in the "O" in Piedmont.

If you want to buy both cards, the price is $200.00 shipped.

If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
